property.name: current

property.name: current

property.name: current

update_node.description: Remove the Test with Browser menu-item from Build Menu in the Chassis wizard.

configuration_file.description: Modifying menus for new Performance GUI in java client

update_node.name: Insert_line
update_node.description: Adding new menus for Performance configuration

property.name: current
property.value: <MENU-ITEM name="Configure Threshold"> <OPERATION name="Threshold Object"/> <JAVA-UI action_type="INVOKE_CLASS" action_value="com.adventnet.nms.perfui.InvokePerfUI?ACTION=Threshold" accelerator_modifier="CNTRL" accelerator_key="T" shortcut_key="T"/> </MENU-ITEM>

update_node.name: Insert_line
update_node.description: Adding new menus for Performance configuration

property.name: current
property.value: <MENU-ITEM name="Configure Polled Data"> <OPERATION name="Polling Units"/> <JAVA-UI accelerator_key="D" accelerator_modifier="CNTRL" action_type="INVOKE_CLASS" action_value="com.adventnet.nms.perfui.InvokePerfUI?ACTION=PolledData" shortcut_key="D"/> </MENU-ITEM>

update_node.name: Insert_line
update_node.description: Adding new menus for Performance configuration

property.name: current
property.value: <MENU-ITEM name="Configure Polling Object"> <OPERATION name="Polling Object"/> <JAVA-UI ACTION-ON-NO-PRIVILEGE="DISABLE" accelerator_key="P" accelerator_modifier="CNTRL" action_type="INVOKE_CLASS" action_value="com.adventnet.nms.perfui.InvokePerfUI?ACTION=PollingObject" shortcut_key="P"/> </MENU-ITEM>
